name: Littlest Pet Shop: Jungle
description: Collect and name 20 pets - including brand new Fanciest, Cuddliest, Sportiest, Chilliest and more! Dress up your pets with over 100 accessories to make them even cuter. Explore 4 unique pet-sized worlds! Compete in mini-games with your little pets to earn Kibble Coins! Play 16 fun and challenging games with your pets to unlock accessories, playsets, and new pets too!
